Represents the Cassini1 MINLP (Mixed-Integer Nonlinear Programming) problem.

Detailed Description
Represents the Cassini1 MINLP (Mixed-Integer Nonlinear Programming) problem.
This class models a specific mathematical optimization problem related to the trajectory of the Cassini spacecraft. It is designed to work with certain attributes, including bounds and planets, and relies on the cassini1 function for computation. Users can interact with this class to evaluate optimization solutions within predefined constraints.
optimization problem.
